targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
SELECT metadata_modification_time FROM system.tables 
WHERE name = '$data_source'
AND database = 'cloud_analytics'
targets.rawQuery: SELECT metadata_modification_time FROM system.tables  WHERE name = 'consumption_daily_v2_1' AND database = 'cloud_analytics'

panels.content: ## Если у Вас что-то не работает или Вам не хватает функциональности, пожалуйста, [дайте нам знать](https://forms.yandex-team.ru/surveys/21421/).
panels.title: Обратная связь

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
SELECT
  billing_account_id,
  client_name,
  sumIf(
    cons_sum,
    (
      date > toStartOfDay(multiIf('$period' = 'day', addDays(now(), -1), '$period' = 'week',addWeeks(now(), -1), toStartOfMonth(now())))
      AND date <= toStartOfDay(multiIf('$period' = 'day', addDays(now(), 0), '$period' = 'week',addWeeks(now(), 0), now()))
    )
  ) as "now-1p",
  sumIf(
    cons_sum,
    (
      date > toStartOfDay(multiIf('$period' = 'day', addDays(now(), -2), '$period' = 'week',addWeeks(now(), -2), toStartOfMonth(addMonths(now(), -1))))
      AND date <= toStartOfDay(multiIf('$period' = 'day', addDays(now(), -1), '$period' = 'week',addWeeks(now(), -1), toStartOfMonth(now())))
    )
  ) as "now-2p",
  sumIf(
    cons_sum,
    (
      date > toStartOfDay(multiIf('$period' = 'day', addDays(now(), -3), '$period' = 'week',addWeeks(now(), -3), toStartOfMonth(addMonths(now(), -2))))
      AND date <= toStartOfDay(multiIf('$period' = 'day', addDays(now(), -2), '$period' = 'week',addWeeks(now(), -2), toStartOfMonth(addMonths(now(), -1))))
    )
  ) as "now-3p",
  sumIf(
    cons_sum,
    (
      date > toStartOfDay(multiIf('$period' = 'day', addDays(now(), -4), '$period' = 'week',addWeeks(now(), -4), toStartOfMonth(addMonths(now(), -3))))
      AND date <= toStartOfDay(multiIf('$period' = 'day', addDays(now(), -3), '$period' = 'week',addWeeks(now(), -3),toStartOfMonth(addMonths(now(), -2))))
    )
  ) as "now-4p",
  sumIf(
    cons_sum,
    (
      date > toStartOfDay(multiIf('$period' = 'day', addDays(now(), -5), '$period' = 'week',addWeeks(now(), -5), toStartOfMonth(addMonths(now(), -4))))
      AND date <= toStartOfDay(multiIf('$period' = 'day', addDays(now(), -4), '$period' = 'week',addWeeks(now(), -4), toStartOfMonth(addMonths(now(), -3))))
    )
  ) as "now-5p",
  sumIf(
    cons_sum,
    (
      date > toStartOfDay(multiIf('$period' = 'day', addDays(now(), -6), '$period' = 'week',addWeeks(now(), -6), toStartOfMonth(addMonths(now(), -5))))
      AND date <= toStartOfDay(multiIf('$period' = 'day', addDays(now(), -5), '$period' = 'week',addWeeks(now(), -5), toStartOfMonth(addMonths(now(), -4))))
    )
  ) as "now-6p"
FROM
  cloud_analytics.$data_source
WHERE 
  has([$service_name], service_name)=1
  AND (has([$sales_name], sales_name) = 1 OR has([$sales_name], 'All') = 1 )
  AND (has([$consumption_type], cons_type) =1)
  AND has([$segment], segment) = 1
GROUP BY
  billing_account_id,
  client_name
ORDER BY
  "now-1p" DESC
LIMIT 100
targets.rawQuery: SELECT   billing_account_id,   client_name,   sumIf(     cons_sum,     (       date > toStartOfDay(multiIf('cal_month' = 'day', addDays(now(), -1), 'cal_month' = 'week',addWeeks(now(), -1), toStartOfMonth(now())))       AND date <= toStartOfDay(multiIf('cal_month' = 'day', addDays(now(), 0), 'cal_month' = 'week',addWeeks(now(), 0), now()))     )   ) as "now-1p",   sumIf(     cons_sum,     (       date > toStartOfDay(multiIf('cal_month' = 'day', addDays(now(), -2), 'cal_month' = 'week',addWeeks(now(), -2), toStartOfMonth(addMonths(now(), -1))))       AND date <= toStartOfDay(multiIf('cal_month' = 'day', addDays(now(), -1), 'cal_month' = 'week',addWeeks(now(), -1), toStartOfMonth(now())))     )   ) as "now-2p",   sumIf(     cons_sum,     (       date > toStartOfDay(multiIf('cal_month' = 'day', addDays(now(), -3), 'cal_month' = 'week',addWeeks(now(), -3), toStartOfMonth(addMonths(now(), -2))))       AND date <= toStartOfDay(multiIf('cal_month' = 'day', addDays(now(), -2), 'cal_month' = 'week',addWeeks(now(), -2), toStartOfMonth(addMonths(now(), -1))))     )   ) as "now-3p",   sumIf(     cons_sum,     (       date > toStartOfDay(multiIf('cal_month' = 'day', addDays(now(), -4), 'cal_month' = 'week',addWeeks(now(), -4), toStartOfMonth(addMonths(now(), -3))))       AND date <= toStartOfDay(multiIf('cal_month' = 'day', addDays(now(), -3), 'cal_month' = 'week',addWeeks(now(), -3),toStartOfMonth(addMonths(now(), -2))))     )   ) as "now-4p",   sumIf(     cons_sum,     (       date > toStartOfDay(multiIf('cal_month' = 'day', addDays(now(), -5), 'cal_month' = 'week',addWeeks(now(), -5), toStartOfMonth(addMonths(now(), -4))))       AND date <= toStartOfDay(multiIf('cal_month' = 'day', addDays(now(), -4), 'cal_month' = 'week',addWeeks(now(), -4), toStartOfMonth(addMonths(now(), -3))))     )   ) as "now-5p",   sumIf(     cons_sum,     (       date > toStartOfDay(multiIf('cal_month' = 'day', addDays(now(), -6), 'cal_month' = 'week',addWeeks(now(), -6), toStartOfMonth(addMonths(now(), -5))))       AND date <= toStartOfDay(multiIf('cal_month' = 'day', addDays(now(), -5), 'cal_month' = 'week',addWeeks(now(), -5), toStartOfMonth(addMonths(now(), -4))))     )   ) as "now-6p" FROM   cloud_analytics.consumption_daily_v2_1 WHERE    has(['compute','mdb','network','storage','ai','nlb','cr','ymq'], service_name)=1   AND (has(['All'], sales_name) = 1 OR has(['All'], 'All') = 1 )   AND (has(['paid'], cons_type) =1)   AND has(['unmanaged','isv','enterprise','isv_large','var','csm','isv_ml'], segment) = 1 GROUP BY   billing_account_id,   client_name ORDER BY   "now-1p" DESC LIMIT 100

list.definition: SELECT DISTINCT segment FROM cloud_analytics.$data_source WHERE segment != ''
list.name: segment
list.query: SELECT DISTINCT segment FROM cloud_analytics.$data_source WHERE segment != ''

list.definition: SELECT DISTINCT sales_name FROM cloud_analytics.$data_source WHERE has([$segment], segment) = 1
list.name: sales_name
list.query: SELECT DISTINCT sales_name FROM cloud_analytics.$data_source WHERE has([$segment], segment) = 1
